example.text: With this ruling the Court passes the buck back to Congress. Sec. 230 reform is urgently & abundantly needed. [[url]]

Much needed collaboration is central to these new executive orders. Glad to see an interagency task-force coming together to work on this crisis, while federal action is bolstered by partnerships with local/state governments. 2/

So every mom can have a safe & healthy pregnancy we must solve our country’s maternal health crisis. I’ve helped introduce the #Momnibus—a package of 13 bills—with [[user]], [[user]], & [[user]] to save moms’ lives. [[url]]

That is why voters went to the polls and showed with their feet where they stand. And that is why we need to fight rulings from the courts, with hard-right Republican judges who have declared a war on women.

Proud to join Greater Middletown Community Aid for Ukraine in rallying support for brave, fierce resistance to Putin’s crimes against humanity, & threat to American security. Songs, speeches, salt & bread show our solidarity. [[url]]
